::KitKat::

She didn't want to give up yet, she hoped her next idea might stall 
fo time. She opened up the outside speakers. "Megatron, this is 
KitKat.  What is it that you want from here? If you stop firing, I 
shall wish to talk to you."

She looked over at her clone and saw that it was only 20% finishes.  
She sighed, and hoped that she might be able to stall for a lot more 
time.
